author: Simon Difford
description: A wonderful creamy, fruity concoction that's not half as sticky as the world would have you believe. Too much ice will detract from the creaminess and kill the drink.
name: Pina Colada Cocktail (Puerto Rican style)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
20 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop crushed ice and serve with paper straws
